duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet customers, answer their questions, and provide assistance in a friendly and professional manner.
Monitor alerts to ensure timely completion of orders and conduct customer pick-ups during peak times.
Locate ordered items in the store and prepare merchandise for shipment using handheld technology and appropriate packing materials.
Assist other teams as needed in areas such as unloading and processing new merchandise.
Work with other team members throughout the store to achieve goals and maintain a positive work environment.
